item.title: Need Help [Barrows]
item.dc:creator: @Visual_Basic_Matt Visual Basic Matt
item.description:
@Visual_Basic_Matt wrote:

I’ve made barrows and I have the kill count load and save and display in the bottom right corner.
I need a method of after a npc is killed, the killcount goes up. I’ve came up with this code.

if (npcs[NPCID].npcType == 2025) { int Player = npcs[NPCID].StartKilling; BarrowsKills = (BarrowsKills + 1); }

Where exactly would I put this, and will this even work? I use delta’s source.

I appreciate all help.

Read full topic
